risk_classification.description: Client risk classification: low, standard, high

prompt_client_to_authenticate.description: Indicates whether the client should be prompted to authenticate their account.

status.description: Account status. Possible status: authenticated (client is fully authenticated), age_verification (client is age-verified), cashier_locked (cashier is locked), disabled (account is disabled), unwelcome (client cannot deposit or buy contracts, but can withdraw or sell contracts), withdrawal_locked (deposits allowed but withdrawals locked), ukgc_funds_protection (client has acknowledged UKGC funds protection notice), crs_tin_information (client has updated tax related information), financial_assessment_not_complete (client has not completed financial assessment), professional (this client has opted for a professional account), document_expired (client's submitted proof-of-identity documents have expired), document_expiring_soon (client's submitted proof-of-identity documents are expiring within a month)

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
